str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To have come, be present, have arrived. A primary verb; to arrive, i.e. Be present.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Hated, hostile; subst: an enemy. From a primary echtho; hateful; usually as a noun, an adversary.

str2: To encircle, surround, encompass. From peri and kukloo; to encircle all around, i.e. Blockade completely.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From sun and echo; to hold together, i.e. To compress or arrest; figuratively, to compel, perplex, afflict, preoccupy.
From all sides, on all sides. Adverb from pas; from all sides.
